control_parameters.title: Setting control parameters
control_parameters.description: Set control parameters that are required for the heating controller logic

data.timeout_for_heat_dhw_from_acc: Timer for heating DHW from ACC (in minutes)
data.temperature_delta_limit_acc_dhw: Max. temperature difference between DHW and ACC for stopping transfer
data.disabled_acc_temperature_limit: Minimum temperature limit for enabling output when ACC is off
data.min_temperature_for_heating: Minimum temperature in ACC required for heating
data.temperature_delta_limit_in_acc: Maximum allowed temperature difference between ACC1 and ACC2
data.heating_source_command_debounce_delay: Heating source command debounce delay (in seconds)
data.auxiliary_pump_booster_time: Duration the auxiliary pump is on (in minutes)

valve_control.title: Valve control parameters
valve_control.description: Setting operating parameters for valve control

data.valve_output_acc_strict_mode: Control mode for valves at the outputs from ACC
data.valve_input_acc_strict_mode: Control mode for valves at inputs to ACC
data.valve_input_acc_closing_delay_when_heati: Delay in closing ACC input valves when heating source stop (in minutes)

valves.title: Valves
valves.description: Select valves so that the heating system can control them

data.valve_from_hp_to_acc_or_dhw: Switching valve from heat pump to ACC or DHW
data.valve_output_acc1: Shut-off valve for output from ACC 1
data.valve_output_acc2: Shut-off valve for output from ACC 2
data.valve_input_acc1: Shut-off valve for input to ACC 1
data.valve_input_acc2: Shut-off valve for input to ACC 2
data.valve_from_acc_to_heat_or_dhw: Switching valve from ACC to heating or DHW
data.valve_output_heating: Shut-off valve for output to heating

temperature_sensors.title: Temperature Sensors
temperature_sensors.description: Select temperature sensors entities that are required for the heating controller logic

pumps.title: Water Pumps
pumps.description: Select circulation water pumps so that the heating system can control them
